MusicLandscape.util

Interface MyFormatter<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSVTrackFormatter

    public interface MyFormatter<T>
    This class represents the concept of (tabular) formatting of objects.
    Implementing classes provide methods to create a formatted table of records, including column headers and a top separator (between headers and data) with correct column width.
    It is intended to be used with lists (or arrays) of objects that need to be displayed in tabular format. One would typically use a formatter of this kind to print the header and separator (if desired) followed by the individual records line-by-line.
    Author:
    TeM, JS
    Programming Problem Category:
    generic interface
    Introduced in:
    ExerciseSheet05
